name: Belavia Tupolev Tu-154 Full Flight: Minsk to Geneva (with ATC)
description:
A full, uncut full flight video with Belavia from Minsk (MSQ) to Geneva (GVA) onboard the last ever Tupolev 154 flight into Europe.

On 29 May 2015, Belavia operated the last ever Tu-154 flight into Europe onboard aircraft EW-85748.  I was lucky enough to secure a seat on the flight, which is normally operated by CRJ.

Key parts:

00:00:11   Boarding
00:12:40    Engine start
00:21:45    Takeoff
02:26:00    Top of descent
02:55:15     Approaching Geneva
03:00:05      Landing in GVA
03:12:00      Deboarding

The video begins in the terminal at Minsk, prior to boarding, before we get a bus out to the aircraft sitting on a remote stand.  The engines start soon after boarding, and we are on our way for the 2.5 hour flight to Geneva.

We turn left after takeoff, getting a great view of the city of Minsk, before heading towards Warsaw, Prague, Stuttgart, Zurich and finally for a beautiful scenic approach along Lake Geneva and landing with full reverse thrust deployed.  ATC is included for approach and landing in Geneva.

Video taken from seat 23F.

Airline:  Belavia
Flight:  B2871
Aircraft:  Tupolev Tu-154 EW-85748
From:  Minsk - National (MSQ)
To:  Geneva (GVA)
Departure:  08:33
Arrival:  09:55
Flight Time:  02:22
Seat:  23F
Flight Path:  http://goo.gl/moxNMd

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1

MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
